name: Primeape
description: The Pig Monkey Pokémon. It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

abilities.name: Vital Spirit
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be put to sleep.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: After suffering a critical hit, this Pokémon doubles the damage dice for a single move it activates on the following turn.

abilities.name: Defiant
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is suffering from a negative status effect or stat change imposed by an opponent, it gains +2 to all attack rolls.
